question: What types of home services do you offer?
answer: We offer a wide range of home services, including plumbing, electrical work, carpentry, painting, cleaning, gardening, and more. Our experienced professionals are skilled in various tasks to meet your home service needs.

question: How do I schedule a home service appointment?
answer: Scheduling a home service appointment is easy! You can book a service through our website or mobile app. Simply select the type of service you need, choose a convenient date and time, and provide your contact information. Our team will confirm your appointment and send a skilled professional to your doorstep.

question: Are your service professionals licensed and insured?
answer: Yes, all our service professionals are licensed, insured, and thoroughly vetted to ensure your safety and satisfaction. We prioritize the quality of service, and our professionals are highly skilled and experienced in their respective fields.

question: What payment methods do you accept for home services?
answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, online payments, and cash. You can choose the most convenient payment option for you. After the service is completed and you are satisfied with the work, you can make the payment to the service professional.
